r.d: Package containes locale validation for Belgium such as: * Postal Code * Bank Account Number * Structured Bank Transfer message (Nationnal transfer from an bank account to another) * VAT * Natitonal ID * Identity Card Number (not ready) * SIS CARD ID (belgian "sécurité sociale" ID)
r.n: - Switch to the new BSD License (see http://www.opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php)
